name: hello-express
description: A simple Node app built on Express, instantly up and running.

scripts.start: npx nodemon --exec 'npm run build && npm run serve'
scripts.writeChars: node -e 'var w = require("./build.js"); w.writeChars().then(() => console.log("complete writeChars"))'
scripts.writeMainPages: node -e 'var w = require("./build.js"); w.writeMainPages().then(() => console.log("complete writeMainPages"))'
scripts.writeIndex: node -e 'var w = require("./build.js"); w.writeIndex().then(() => console.log("complete writeIndex"))'
scripts.copyPublic: node -e 'var w = require("./build.js"); w.copyPublic().then(() => console.log("complete copyPublic"))'
scripts.writeGrid: node -e 'var w = require("./build.js"); w.writeGrid().then(() => console.log("complete writeGrid"))'
scripts.writeCols: node -e 'var w = require("./build.js"); w.writeCols().then(() => console.log("complete buildCols"))'
scripts.build: npm run writeChars && npm run writeMainPages && npm run writeIndex && npm run copyPublic && npm run writeGrid && npm run writeCols
